SEARCH
Package Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the traffic simulation game. This class allows a player to interact with the game world, including making decisions about vehicle movement, observing the surroundings, and responding to game challenges.

  • Method Details

    • getVehicle

      public Vehicle getVehicle()
      Retrieves the vehicle currently controlled by the player.
      Returns:
      The Vehicle object controlled by the player.

    • setVehicle

      public void setVehicle(Vehicle vehicle)
      Assigns a vehicle for the player to control.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The Vehicle to be controlled by the player.

    • lookAround

      public void lookAround()
      Provides information about the immediate surroundings of the player's vehicle, such as nearby vehicles in the current road segment or intersection.

    • isMoveValid

      public boolean isMoveValid(MovementDecision decision)
      Validates the player's movement decision based on the current state of the game world.
      Parameters:
      decision - The MovementDecision made by the player.
      Returns:
      true if the decision is valid and can be executed, false otherwise.

    • makeMovementDecision

      public void makeMovementDecision(MovementDecision decision)
      Executes the player's movement decision if it is validated as a valid move.
      Parameters:
      decision - The MovementDecision to be executed.

    • canChangeLaneLeft

      public boolean canChangeLaneLeft()
      Determines if the player's vehicle can safely change lanes to the left.
      Returns:
      true if the lane change to the left is possible and safe, false otherwise.

    • canChangeLaneRight

      public boolean canChangeLaneRight()
      Determines if the player's vehicle can safely change lanes to the right.
      Returns:
      true if the lane change to the right is possible and safe, false otherwise.

    • canTurnLeft

      public boolean canTurnLeft()
      Determines if the player's vehicle can safely turn left at the next opportunity.
      Returns:
      true if turning left is possible and safe, false otherwise.

    • canTurnRight

      public boolean canTurnRight()
      Determines if the player's vehicle can safely turn right at the next opportunity.
      Returns:
      true if turning right is possible and safe, false otherwise.

    • canKeepStraight

      public boolean canKeepStraight()
      Determines if the player's vehicle can continue moving straight ahead safely.
      Returns:
      true if continuing straight is possible and safe, false otherwise.

    • changeLaneLeft

      public void changeLaneLeft(Vehicle vehicle)
      Executes the action of changing lanes to the left for the player's vehicle.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The player's vehicle attempting to change lanes.

    • changeLaneRight

      public void changeLaneRight(Vehicle vehicle)
      Executes the action of changing lanes to the right for the player's vehicle.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The player's vehicle attempting to change lanes.

    • keepStraight

      public void keepStraight(Vehicle vehicle)
      Executes the action of keeping the player's vehicle moving straight.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The player's vehicle that continues to move straight.

    • challenge

      public void challenge()
      Initiates a challenge for the player. This method represents an opportunity for the player to engage in a specific game scenario or task that could influence the outcome of the game.
